entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Walkerton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:18 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
